sub_title: Category Manager Access Control - and Fire Alarm Systems Benelux at ADI Benelux
summary:
henk.elenbaas13@ziggo.nl,  Mobile : (+31) (0) 651602801
I am a people-oriented and loyal person. Connecting people gives me energy. By listening carefully and giving people the feeling that they are understood, I know how to break through resistance. Planning and organizing are part of my nature and I know how to communicate easily on different levels. Product management is just like running a marathon a passion for me. Responding structurally to unforeseen circumstances and taking decisions gives me fulfilment. I am proud every time I can introduce a new product together with my team.


Professional accomplishments :

► Having performed various challenging international jobs.  
► Developed myself into an experienced and professional business developer.
► Initiated and launched various sophisticated distinctive new product concepts.

Key geographical markets : 
► Europe, Near - Middle and Far East, North America, Canada and Australia.

Key elements for successfully developing business with new products :
► Market assessments - Let customers themselves discover which challenges they have and how they could potentially be solved.  Understanding customer needs. Perform test marketing.
► Set up and present 3 - 5 years business cases for new product developments
► Initiate, specify, develop and launch distinctive new product concepts. Leading multidisciplinary project teams, using extensive gate model.
► Emphasise on product concepts which contain beneficial features for customers in each stage of the total product life cycle, from the buying process until replacing the product.
► Develop leasing concepts. Customers are eagerly willing to enter into a lease contract, not having to care about their safety equipment. 
► Launch products to market, using unique and customer type dedicated marketing tools.

Personal competencies :
► Understanding what challenges customers have, they sometimes have not discovered themselves yet.
► Empathise with – and anticipate on - differences in culture amongst people, companies, business models, etc.
► Understand – and influence various market players. Know the role they play in the process from having a new product concept idea until a successful  market launch.
► Inspire sales teams to sell what the market needs. Value-added sales.

Product management. Using Steven Haines´  bible of productmanagement  ´The Product Manager desk reference´.  Memphis, USA.

profile_positions.title: Category Manager Access Control - and Fire Alarm Systems BeNeLux

profile_positions.description:
ADI Global distribution is de toonaangevende wereldwijde groothandelsdistributeur van beveiligings-, AV- en laagspanningsproducten. Met meer dan 25 jaar ervaring is ADI uitgegroeid tot een van de grootste distributeurs met meer dan 200 kantoren in Amerika, Europa, het Midden-Oosten, Afrika en Azië-Pacific. Strategische leveranciersrelaties en focus op klantenservice, stelt ADI in staat klanten te bedienen met een uitgebreid assortiment producten en diensten.

ADI Benelux
Als onderdeel van ADI Global distribution, specialiseren wij ons op het aanbieden van veiligheid oplossingen zoals video bewaking, inbraakbeveiliging, toegangscontrole en brandmeldsystemen
ADI Benelux gelooft dat haar persoonlijke relaties, ondersteunende diensten, en breed productaanbod u voorzien van de beste beveiligingsoplossingen. Onze medewerkers gebruiken hun passie en specialistische kennis om de beste beveiligingsoplossingen te leveren

ADI Global distribution is the leading global wholesale distributor of security, AV and low voltage products. In more than 25 years in the business , ADI has become one of the largest distributors with more then 200 offices in the Amersica´s, Europe, Middle east, Africa and Asia-Pacific. Strategic supplier relationship and focus on customer service, allows ADI to serve customers with a comprehensive range of products and services. 

ADI Benelux
As part of ADI Global distribution, we focus on security solutions, such a video surveillance, intrusion protection, access control - and fire-alarm systems.  
ADI Benelux believes that its personal relationships, support services, and wide product range provide you with the best security solutions. Our staff use their passion and specialist knowledge to deliver the best security solutions.
profile_positions.title: Product Manager access control - and fire alarm systems / BeNeLux

profile_positions.description:
KWx is a business unit of Hanzestrohm, offering products and services from an international brand portfolio. Serves customers in the Netherlands and Belgium. 130 employees in NL, incl. bus. unit Hemmink and shared services teams.

Wide product portfolio of EXplosion proof products. KWx EX product group, € 4 M annual revenue.

► PLC management. Market pricing. Gross margin product group. Inventory. Product data in ERP system. Sales support. Market research. Defining new product market combinations, (International) Vendor management, Customer training, The message - and content of marketing collateral, trade shows, lectures and seminars.
► Setting up a rationalised product portfolio and rationalised the number of vendors, emphasising in this way on key markets and their needs for the right solutions.
► Setting out the annual product group plan, using it as a guide  in maintaining vendor relationships and working with internal shared services teams and sales, justifying customer needs.
► Increase revenues from 20% of our key customers, being responsible for 80% of annual turnover. 
► Developing market pricing strategy and improved rebate structure with vendors : Increase of gross margin by 5%.
► Managing in cooperation with marketing teams, several new product introductions. (see amongst others the featured item on new Hawke EX cable glands)
profile_positions.title: Product Manager explosion proof products

profile_positions.description:
ABB is a pioneering technology leader that works closely with utility, industry, transport and infrastructure customers in roughly 100 countries. 144.000 employees worldwide.

'Emergency lighting' is a product group within ABB's 'Electrification Products' division, USD 200 M annual revenue globally. (2017)

► Defining and promoting 5 years global product strategy.
► Developing additional business in 'new' countries like Germany, Sweden and Middle East region. 
    Additional revenue 2014-2017 : USD 10 M.
►,Building on 'over the counter' distributor business. Additional revenue 2014 - 2017 : USD 5 M.
► Extending global portfolio with interfacing to various building management systems. Keeping up with changing market demands : BMS, DALI, ZIGBEE, WIFI, LIFI, KNX, IIOT
► Developing and launching a revolutionary modular Emergency Lighting product concept, EVAGO
(see amongst others the featured item on EVAGO)
► Developing, in cooperation with Norwegian software company and a Dutch hardware development company, a web based emergency lighting maintenance system, NaveoPro. (see amongst others the featured item on NaveoPro)
► Extensive market research in Italy and Poland. Build on product portfolio's for both countries.
► Rationalising EMEA product portfolio. Reducing costs. 
► Improving gross margin by by roughly 5%.
► Leading multi disciplinary (8+ members) project teams, using extensive stage gate model.
► Driving new product developments, working with 4 R&D teams and manufacturing plants in UK, 
    The Netherlands, Germany and France.
► Managing 2 product managers, one in the Benelux and one in France.
profile_positions.title: Global Product Manager Emergency - and safety lighting

profile_positions.description:
Thomas & Betts (T&B) is an USA based - global acting - company, providing a multiplicity of products, bringing electrical power into peoples lives. 13.000 employees worldwide.

Emergency lighting is a product group within T&B's 'Safety Products' division. USD 90 M annual revenue EMEA region. (2013)

► Defining and promoting 3 year EMEA product strategy.
► Establishing stronger cooperation between 4 individual working R&D teams in Europe, resulting in an European product portfolio, rather then individual portfolio´s by country. In addition shorter product development lead times and reduction of costs.
► Setting up - and maintaining - EMEA product portfolio, combining local product needs with overall product applicability, increasing annual revenues from USD 70 M in 2008 into USD 90 M in 2013.
► Extending geographical scope with : Belgium, Germany, Sweden, Norway, Portugal Austria, Denmark and Middle East region.
► Leading multi disciplinary (8+ members) project teams, using extensive stage gate model.
► Launching products together with multiple country sales organisations. Building on marketing tools, training sales teams and customers.
profile_positions.title: EMEA Product Manager Emergency lighting at Thomas & Betts NL BV

profile_positions.description:
Setting up of a Belgian- and Swedish sales office. 

Managing a marketing - and product management team of 6 professionals, responsible for :

► Mid - to long term product - and marketing strategy.
► Supporting NL, Belgian and Swedish sales team.
► Supporting in various European countries, including Turkey and Russia, and Middle East region, both agents and distributors, exclusively promoting Thomas & Betts emergency lighting.
► Specifying and creating country specific emergency lighting product portfolios. Training, Customer visits, Market research, Defining and performing country specific marketing activities.
► Driving new product developments, working with Netherlands based R&D team and manufacturing plant.
profile_positions.title: EMEA Product Marketing Manager Emergency lighting at Thomas & Betts NL BV

profile_positions.description:
Supporting agents and distributors in Europe (including Turkey and Russia) and Middle East, exclusively promoting Thomas & Betts emergency lighting.

Grow the Thomas & Betts emergency lighting business in Europe and Middle East region by establishing / and supporting - new - agents and distributors.

Specifying and creating country specific emergency lighting product portfolios. 
► Training, Exhibitions, Seminars.
► Customer visits.
► Market research.
► Creating country specific marketing tools.
profile_positions.title: Export Manager Europe Emergency lighting at Thomas & Betts NL BV

profile_positions.description:
Selling gas - and liquid chromatography equipment in Europe, Middle East - and Far East region.

Service - and application support, gas - and liquid chromatography equipment worldwide.

► Application - and service training to customers worldwide.
► Supporting the set up of marketing collateral and technical manuals.
profile_positions.title: Area sales manager Middle East, Far East and Europe at Chrompack, part of Agilent Technologies

profile_positions.description:
Service and application support, public audio, congress communication - and voting equipment, worldwide.

► Hands on service of equipment. 
► Setting up service manuals in various languages.
► Provision of training material for local service teams and ‘train the trainers’.
► Ensuring, being part of new product development team, the service friendliness of products.
► Defining spare parts and managing global spare parts data base.
profile_positions.title: International Service Engineer Public audio systems
